content.raw:
I was able to open the three VRC worlds without any problem.

The problem reported by @thomasko in issue #637 (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eC_1MiATQBE) looks fixed for me. Camera around the terrain is working fine.

For testing the physics I drop a cube on several parts of the terrain and all the movements seems pretty accurate.

I wasn't able to find the way to enable the terrain editor in runtime, sorry.
content.html:
I was able to open the three VRC worlds without any problem.

The problem reported by @thomasko in issue #637 (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eC_1MiATQBE) looks fixed for me. Camera around the terrain is working fine.

For testing the physics I drop a cube on several parts of the terrain and all the movements seems pretty accurate.

I wasn't able to find the way to enable the terrain editor in runtime, sorry.
